name: mutational
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to mutation (= change in genes or organisms): mutational variance Mutational variance is high for mortality in infancy and early childhood. Tests evaluate the sunscreen's ability to protect against mutational effects.
More examplesFewer examplesMutational analysis in the patient showed a mutation of the gene that has not been identified before.In some cells a single mutational event can cause the tumour to develop.The surgeon did not have any knowledge of the mutational status of the gene.We performed mutational analysis of tumour specimens from several patients.
